dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal Activity on your servers must cease: http://www.xinio.info/]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, May 02, 2005 10:14 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal Activity on your servers must cease:
http://www.xinio.info/]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------

<A7797A1A53CB384D8F25E5C3AACAF6CE03E11C0E@hqpex02.i.zinio.com>
X-MS-Has-Attach:

Thread-Topic:         Illegal Activity on your servers must cease:
http://www.xinio.info/

X-Priority:         1
Priority:         Urgent
Importance:         high
From:         Otto Imken <oimken@zinio.com>
To:         <admins@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>
Received-SPF:         none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 64.242.146.125 is
neither permitted nor denied by domain of zinio.com)
client-ip=64.242.146.125; envelope-from=oimken@zinio.com;
helo=zin-mx-01.zinio.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.7
Cc:         
Subject:         [ABUSE] Illegal Activity on your servers must cease:
http://www.xinio.info/
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.5
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.7



Hello,



I am writing to insist that you immediately remove http://www.xinio.info/
from your servers.



It is infringing copyrighted material owned by Zinio Systems, Inc.,
Ziff-Davis, and numerous other magazine publishers.



Please compare their site http://www.xinio.info/ with our home page:
http://www.zinio.com/



I think you will agree that it is infringing upon our corporate trademarks
and the copyrights of our clients, including PC Magazine and Electronic
Gaming World, to name two. Please disable their site immediately.



If you fail to remove their site from your servers immediately, or fail to
write to me to confirm it has been removed, we will contact our lawyers
tomorrow - May 3, 2005 - and begin immediate legal action to get cease and
desist orders against both theplanet.com and xinio.info.



Please contact me at your earliest convenience.



Otto Imken

Manager of Customer Support

Zinio Systems, Inc.

oimken@zinio.com <mailto:oimken@zinio.com>

(415) 494-2709



Zinio Systems, Inc.

139 Townsend St., 3rd Floor

San Francisco, CA 94107

http://www.zinio.com/help



- -- --
